purpose: To provide a robust framework for developing and orchestrating agentic systems, enabling complex interactions between multiple agents.
principle: Utilizes a modular architecture to facilitate the creation and coordination of multiple specialized agents, leveraging Python and related libraries for agent development.
reusability: Offers a modular design with reusable components for agent development, includes APIs for integration and extensibility.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited documentation and examples, and potential stability issues during early development.
name: graphite
description: Graphite Agentic Framework by Binome Technologies
highlight: A framework for building and managing agentic systems with a focus on multi-agent orchestration.
